Description_lang: Removes all Curses from a friendly target. $?s115700[If any Curses are successfully removed, you deal $115701s1% additional damage for $115701d.][]

description_blz.en_US: Removes all Curses from a friendly target.
description_blz.es_MX: Elimina todas las maldiciones de un objetivo amistoso.
description_blz.pt_BR: Remove todas as maldições do alvo aliado.
description_blz.de_DE: Befreit ein befreundetes Ziel von allen Flüchen.
description_blz.en_GB: Removes all Curses from a friendly target.
description_blz.es_ES: Elimina todas las maldiciones de un objetivo amistoso.
description_blz.fr_FR: Annule toutes les malédictions sur une cible alliée.
description_blz.it_IT: Dissolve tutte le maledizioni da un bersaglio alleato.
description_blz.ko_KR: 아군 대상에게 걸린 저주를 모두 해제합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 移除一名友方目標身上的所有詛咒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 从一个友方目标身上移除所有诅咒。
